original_solution_mapping.L1: Greta the goose eats 20/10=<<20/10=2>>2 pounds of food per day.
original_solution_mapping.L2: Milton the mouse eats (1/100)*2=1/50 of a pound of food per day.
original_solution_mapping.L3: Elmer the elephant eats 4000*(1/50)=<<4000*(1/50)=80>>80 pounds of food per day.
original_solution_mapping.L4: Thus, Elmer eats 80-20=60 pounds more food per day than does Penelope the pig.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 1997.
    Returns: the difference in pounds of food eaten per day between Elmer the elephant and Penelope the pig.
    """
    # L1
    penelope_food_per_day = 20 # Penelope the pig eats 20 pounds of food per day
    penelope_greta_ratio = 10 # 10 times more than Greta the goose eats
    greta_food_per_day = penelope_food_per_day / penelope_greta_ratio

    # L2
    milton_greta_fraction = Fraction(1, 100) # 1/100 as much as Greta the goose eats per day
    milton_food_per_day = milton_greta_fraction * greta_food_per_day

    # L3
    elmer_milton_multiplier = 4000 # 4000 times more than Milton the mouse does per day
    elmer_food_per_day = elmer_milton_multiplier * milton_food_per_day

    # L4
    difference_elmer_penelope = elmer_food_per_day - penelope_food_per_day

    # FA
    answer = difference_elmer_penelope
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Greta the goose eats {penelope_food_per_day}/{penelope_greta_ratio}=<<{penelope_food_per_day}/{penelope_greta_ratio}={greta_food_per_day}>>{greta_food_per_day} pounds of food per day.
Milton the mouse eats ({milton_greta_fraction})*{greta_food_per_day}={milton_food_per_day} of a pound of food per day.
Elmer the elephant eats {elmer_milton_multiplier}*({milton_food_per_day})=<<{elmer_milton_multiplier}*({milton_food_per_day})={elmer_food_per_day}>>{elmer_food_per_day} pounds of food per day.
Thus, Elmer eats {elmer_food_per_day}-{penelope_food_per_day}={difference_elmer_penelope} pounds more food per day than does Penelope the pig.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: Greta the goose eats 20/10=<<20/10=2>>2 pounds of food per day.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: Milton the mouse eats (1/100)*2=0.02 of a pound of food per day.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: Elmer the elephant eats 4000*(0.02)=<<4000*(0.02)=80>>80 pounds of food per day.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: Thus, Elmer eats 80-10=70 pounds more food per day than does Penelope the pig.

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'penelope_greta_ratio' (10) was used instead of 'penelope_food_per_day' (20).
